description: Information about a person who submitted or contributed to a project.
title: contact

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

contact_name.description: The contact's name. Should be in the format 'first, middle, last name'. Middle can be initial or left blank.

email.description: An email address for the contact.

phone.description: Phone number (including country code) of contact or contact's lab.

institution.description: Name of primary institute where contact works.

laboratory.description: Name of lab (often the PI name) within institute where contact works.

address.description: Street address where contact works. Should include street name and number, city, country division, postal code.
